title: sAdhu sangattinai
sahitya:
sAdhu sangattinai nADu shuddha saccidAnanda paramAtmanaik-kUDu


anupallavi

  vAdu vazhakkirkku vAip-pUTTup-pODu vAsiyaDakki shiva nEsattaip-pADu


caraNam    Eka guruvAna idayEshanai vaNangu ellA nallAruDanum inidu nI iNangu
shOka mOha guNa donda bandhamillA shuddhAnanda sorUpa dIpamE vIDu
